name: Sports Salaries API
title: Sports Salaries API
description: The USA TODAY Salaries API allows developers to programmatically access the USA TODAY Sports Salaries database. Extensive information for the MLB, NFL, NBA and NHL is available for multiple seasons, including player, position and team data.

Salaries.description: Returns salary data for the MLB, NFL, NBA and NHL leagues.

players.description: Use this parameter to retrieve salary information for a specific player. Player requests should be formatted using dashes in place of spaces. For example, derek-jeter

positions.description: Use this parameter to retrieve salary information for a specific position. Example: of=outfielders

teams.description: Use this parameter to retrieve salary information for a specific team. Team requests should be formatted as the team's name (not including the hometown) and spaces should be eliminated. For example, a request to retrieve information for the Boston Red Sox should be formatted as redsox, yankees

year.description: Use year to define which salary years you would like returned (by default, returns the current season)

minseason.description: Use with maxseason to retrieve a range of season

maxseason.description: Use with minseason to retrieve a range of season

seasons.description: Use seasons=all to retrieve data from all available seasons

top.description: Use this parameter to limit your results to the X highest salaries in your query, where X equals the value of top. By default, all available information is returned.

encoding.description: Output format as JSON or XML. Choose blank for XML/RSS
